titleInfo.title: USA v. Almaguer
titleInfo.subTitle: Minute entry for initial appearance and arraignment held in Omaha on 02/14/2006 before Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken as to defendant Angela M. Almaguer. Defendant acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Indictment. Defendant requests appointment of counsel and counsel is appointed. Not guilty plea entered on all counts. Defendant does request discovery material pursuant to Rule 16. Government does adopt open file policy regarding discovery. Time reserved for hearing on any pretrial motions is 03/14/2006 at 9:00 a.m. to be held in conjunction with the motion hearing in 8:06CR21 USA v. Edward Clark. Progression order to be issued. Court takes judicial notice of U.S. Pretrial Services report. Defendant released on bond. Appearance for plaintiff: Kimberly C. Bunjer. Appearance for defendant: Karen M. Shanahan, FPD. Courtroom Deputy: Mary Beth Baker. Interpreter Used: no. Court Reporter: Digital Recorder. Time Commenced: 2:20 p.m. Time Concluded: 2:29 p.m. Time in Court: 9 minutes. THIS IS A TEXT ONLY ENTRY. A PDF DOCUMENT IS NOT ATTACHED TO THIS ENTRY. (MBB)

titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER scheduling 20 Government's Motion to Consolidate Cases (filing no. 12 in 8:06cr21) for hearing before the undersigned magistrate judge at 9:00 a.m. on May 19, 2006, in Courtroom No. 7. The defendants shall file a response to the motion on or before May 17, 2006, as to Angela M. Almaguer (1). Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 5/12/2006. (JAE, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Almaguer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - Defendant Edward Clark's motion to continue the consolidation hearing (Filing No. 14 in 8:06CR21) is granted. The government's motion to consolidate the trials of Clark and Almaguer 20 and (Filing No. 12 in 8:06cr21) is rescheduled for 3:00 p.m. on June 5, 2006, in Courtroom No. 7. The defendants must be present for the hearing. Defendant Angela M. Almaguer's motion to continue trial 23 is granted. The trials of both defendants are continued and will be re-set during the consolidation hearing on June 5, 2006. Signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 5/18/2006. (JAE, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Almaguer
titleInfo.subTitle: SENTENCING MEMORANDUM OPINION as to defendant Angela M. Almaguer. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon.(ADB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: SENTENCING MEMORANDUM OPINION as to defendant Angela M. Almaguer. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon.(ADB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Almaguer
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Angela M. Almaguer (1), Count 1 - DEFENDANT pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of twenty-four (24) months; 4 years supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 special assessment; the defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated bythe Bureau of Prisons as notified by the United States Marshal as to defendant Angela M. Almaguer. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (4 certified copies given to US Marshal)(ADB)
